thread.title: Lenovo P2 with 5.5-inch 1080p display and 5,100mAh battery launching in India soon
thread.title_full: Lenovo P2 with 5.5-inch 1080p display and 5,100mAh battery launching in India soon

title: Lenovo P2 with 5.5-inch 1080p display and 5,100mAh battery launching in India soon
text:
Lenovo P2 with 5.5-inch 1080p display and 5,100mAh battery launching in India... Lenovo P2 with 5.5-inch 1080p display and 5,100mAh battery launching in India soon By January 3, 2017 “The P2 sports up to 4GB RAM, Snapdragon 625 and a fingerprint sensor” 
Lenovo is all set to expand its portfolio of Android smartphones in India with the launch of the P2 . The company has tweeted that the phone will be launched in the country soon, but hasn’t provide an exact time-frame for the launch. The P2 is a power-packed mid-range phablet, which the brand unveiled at IFA 2016 in September. How often do you your way because of low phone battery? Travel fearlessly with the longest lasting battery #LenovoP2 #Powerhouse coming soon pic.twitter.com/d4LZ3Thfut — Lenovo India (@Lenovo_in) January 2, 2017 
The Lenovo P2’s biggest highlight is a beefy 5,100mAh battery, which supports fast charging via a 24-watt charger, and lets you charge other devices via USB OTG as well. It features an all-metal body, a fingerprint sensor, a 5.5-inch 1080p display, a Snapdragon 625 SoC, 3GB / 4GB RAM, 32GB / 64GB storage, Android Marshmallow, 13MP/5MP cameras, and 4G LTE, and NFC. 
The Lenovo P2 was launched in China at a starting price of around Rs 19,000. It is expected to be priced between Rs 15,000 – Rs 20,000 in India. Facebook Comments
